raw_body: COSMAS DE SARAM – Beloved son of late Chevalier J.E.M. De Saram and Mrs Marian De Saram nee Karunaratne,​ beloved husband of Mrs Chitranganie De Saram,​ loving father of Chanuka,​ Chiranka,​ Chamindra (Australia) and Chehani,​ father-in-law of Neluka,​ Shalika,​ Michelle (Australia) and Angelo,​ precious Seeya of Shanelle,​ Joshua,​ Matthew and Amelia,​ loving brother of Eileen,​ Dr Ranjith,​ Eshanthamal,​ late Damian and late Sunimal. Remains will lie at Jayaratne ‘Restpect Home’ for viewing from 8.30 a.m. on Thursday 30th November and 1st December. Cortege leaves the ‘Restpect Home’ Jayaratne 1st Dec. 23 at 3.00 p.m. for St. Joseph’s Church,​ Grandpass for final blessing followed by Burial at Madampitiya Cemetery at 4.30 p.m.078062
